tool.name: OGS: PartitionMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'PartitionMesh'.

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: Input (.vtu). the file containing the input mesh

param.name: metis_mesh_input_file
param.label: metis mesh input file
param.help: Input (.mesh). Base name (without .mesh extension) of the file containing the metis input mesh

param.name: ogs2metis
param.label: ogs2metis
param.help: Indicator to convert the ogs mesh file to METIS input file

param.name: exe_metis
param.label: exe metis
param.help: Call mpmetis inside the programme via system().

tool.help: This tool runs the **PartitionMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
